name: Speed Spell - Instant Fusion
text: While you have 3 or more Speed Counters: Pay 1000 LP; Special Summon 1 Level 5 or lower Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck. (This Special Summon is treated as a Fusion Summon.) It cannot attack, and is destroyed during the End Phase. You can only activate 1 "Speed Spell - Instant Fusion" per turn.
